00016 #include "TTEScheduler.h"
00017 
00018 #include <configuration/ConfigurationUtils.h>
00019 
00020 #include <SchedulerMessage_m.h>
00021 #include <SchedulerMessageEvents_m.h>
00022 
00023 namespace TTEthernetModel {
00024 
00025 Define_Module( TTEScheduler);
00026 
00027 void TTEScheduler::initialize()
00028 {
00029     ConfigurationUtils::getPreloadedMMR();
00030     ecorecpp::ModelRepository_ptr mr = ecorecpp::ModelRepository::_instance();
00031     ConfigurationUtils::resolveCommonAliases(mr);
00032     ::ecore::EObject_ptr eobj = mr->getByFilename(getParentModule()->par("network_configuration"));
00033     assert(eobj);
00034     NetworkConfig_ptr nc = ::ecore::instanceOf<NetworkConfig>(eobj);
00035     assert(nc);
00036     DeviceSpecification_ptr ds = ConfigurationUtils::getDeviceSpecification(
00037             getParentModule()->par("device_name").stdstringValue(), nc);
00038     assert(ds);
00039 
00040     //TODO cycle time auslesen
00041 
00042 
00043     if (ds->eClass()->getName() == "Switch")
00044     {
00045         TargetDevice_ptr td = ds->as<Switch> ()->getRefDeviceMapping()->getRefTargetDevice();
00046         if (td->eClass()->getName() == ("TTTechIpTargetDevice"))
00047         {
00048             TTTechIpTargetDevice_ptr iptd = td->as<TTTechIpTargetDevice> ();
00049             par("tick").setDoubleValue(ConfigurationUtils::freq2s(iptd->getClockSpeed()));
00050             //TODO Infomessage of parameter change
00051         }
00052     }
00053 
00054     //Start Timer
00055     scheduleAt(simTime(), new SchedulerEvent("NEW_CYCLE", NEW_CYCLE));
00056 
00057     lastCycleStart = simTime();
00058 }
00059 
00060 void TTEScheduler::registerEvent(SchedulerEvent *event)
00061 {
00062 #ifdef DEBUG
00063     Enter_Method("registerEvent(SchedulerEvent %s)",event->getName());
00064 #else
00065     Enter_Method_Silent();
00066 #endif
00067     take(event);
00068     if (event->getKind() == ACTION_TIME_EVENT)
00069     {
00070         SchedulerActionTimeEvent *actionTimeEvent = (SchedulerActionTimeEvent*) event;
00071 
00072         if (actionTimeEvent->getAction_time() > getTicks())
00073         {
00074             scheduleAt(lastCycleStart + precision(par("tick").doubleValue() * actionTimeEvent->getAction_time()),
00075                     actionTimeEvent);
00076         }
00077         else
00078         {
00079             scheduleAt(
00080                     simTime() + precision(
00081                             par("tick").doubleValue() * (actionTimeEvent->getAction_time() - getTicks() + par(
00082                                     "cycle_ticks").longValue())), actionTimeEvent);
00083         }
00084     }
00085     else if (event->getKind() == TIMER_EVENT)
00086     {
00087         SchedulerTimerEvent *timerEvent = (SchedulerTimerEvent*) event;
00088         ;
00089         scheduleAt(simTime() + precision(par("tick").doubleValue() * timerEvent->getTimer()), event);
00090     }
00091 }
00092 
00093 void TTEScheduler::handleMessage(cMessage *msg)
00094 {
00095     if (msg->isSelfMessage() && (msg->getKind() == ACTION_TIME_EVENT || msg->getKind() == TIMER_EVENT))
00096     {
00097         SchedulerEvent *event = (SchedulerEvent*) msg;
00098         sendDirect(event, event->getDestinationGate());
00099     }
00100     else if (msg->isSelfMessage() && msg->getKind() == NEW_CYCLE)
00101     {
00102         lastCycleStart = simTime();
00103         lastCycleTicks += par("cycle_ticks").longValue();
00104         scheduleAt(lastCycleStart + precision(par("tick").doubleValue() * par("cycle_ticks").longValue()), msg);
00105         //now the precision can be changed (TBD)
00106     }
00107 }
00108 
00109 unsigned int TTEScheduler::getTicks()
00110 {
00111     return round((precision(simTime() - lastCycleStart) / par("tick").doubleValue()).dbl());
00112 }
00113 
00114 unsigned long TTEScheduler::getTotalTicks()
00115 {
00116     return lastCycleTicks + getTicks();
00117 }
00118 
00119 SimTime TTEScheduler::precision(SimTime logical)
00120 {
00121     return logical * 1.000000;
00122 }
